comment.text: The "CustomQuota" translation key is used to display a custom quota label in the filter section of the Home page. It is displayed when a user selects the "Custom Quota" option, indicating that they want to set their own quota threshold. The text appears on a dropdown or filter menu element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'الحصص المخصصة' is a possible translation, it's a bit literal and might not be the most natural way to convey "Custom quota" in a technical context. A more common and clearer translation might be something like 'حصص مخصصة' (with the 'ال' removed) or possibly a phrase that incorporates the concept of customization more directly depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'حصص مخصصة' or a phrase that better captures the 'custom' aspect depending on the specific application of the quota.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation "Հատուկ քվոտայով" translates more closely to "with a custom quota" or "by a custom quota." It doesn't directly translate "Custom quota." A more accurate translation would be something like "տարանջատ քվոտա" (taranjat kvota) which more closely aligns with the meaning of 'Custom quota'.

The translation "カスタムな容量制限" while containing relevant words, doesn't perfectly capture the meaning of 'Custom quota'. 'カスタム' (custom) implies a level of customization, which '容量制限' (capacity limit) doesn't fully convey. A more accurate translation might emphasize that the quota is *configurable* or *user-defined*.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: カスタム設定可能な容量制限

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "අභිරුචි" (abiruchi) can mean custom or personalized, "සලාකය" (salakaya) translates more closely to 'salary' or 'allowance'.  'Quota' in this context refers to a limit or allowance, and a more accurate translation would capture that meaning.  A better term to convey 'quota' would be something along the lines of 'කොටා' (kota) or 'අනුපාන සීමාව' (anupaana seemaawa).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'කොටා' (kota) or 'අනුපාන සීමාව' (anupaana seemaawa) for a more accurate translation of 'quota'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Poljubna kvota" while literally meaning 'any quota' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Custom quota'. 'Custom quota' refers to a quota that is specifically defined or tailored, not just any quota.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation might be 'Določena kvota' (defined quota) or 'Prilagojena kvota' (adapted/tailored quota).
